issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.environment: Works until 5.5.1.GA, none of the versions starting from 6.0.0.GA log the database exceptions

comments.body: Hey there! Not sure why the other one was closed, but it's a valid ticket! The reason is an issue when using run-on-main-thread that is actually fixed already and pending review in TIMOB-25906 for the next release. You can patch your local SDK with the change from [this pull request|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/9966] today and will have it included by default in 7.2.0. Thanks!
